data.author: Dale Perkel

changelog.release_notes:
New Look
Supports all current Pebble platforms
Many new features
Includes payment services via KiezelPay (kiezelpay.com)
Optimised request / response mechanism to API to reduce data usage and response time. Bug Fixes in JS.

Changed to a new API for Cricket Scores to alleviate problems being experienced.
Added some error messages for when services are down (still to be improved)

data.description:
***NEW VERSION!***

Live Cricket V2 is a major re-write of the entire user interface of Live Cricket to work on all current Pebble Platforms.

Live Cricket is no longer free, a one time purchase using KiezelPay at a low $0.99 is required to continue using Live Cricket after the 3 day free trial has elapsed. This has become necessary to support development and server costs.

New Features include:
Brand New UI
Support for Pebble Time, Pebble Time Steel and Pebble Time Round
Bluetooth disconnection notification, click vibrations, improved readability and so so much more!

--------------------------

Live Cricket is a live Cricket Match / Score tracking application. Use this Pebble WatchApp to find the cricket match you are interested in and then monitor the scores in near-realtime.

Features include:
Match Overview and Details (overs, bowler, batsman) etc.
New Multi Screen Layout to improve readibility
Matches including all international 1-day, 5-days and T20 and many local matches
10 score history
"Haptic" vibrations on button clicks
Short vibration to alert you to each time the score changes
